name: dom
title: dom
description: A small library of functional functions, DOM events and Event Streams for HTML and SVG.

scripts.build-nodeps: cat js/dom.js js/dom-activate.js js/dom-touch.js js/dom-swipe.js js/dom.popable.js js/dom.toggleable.js js/dom.switchable.js js/dom.swipeable.js js/dom.focusable.js js/dom.removeable.js js/dom.locateable.js js/dom.dialog-layer.js > dist/dom-nodeps.js && minify dist/dom-nodeps.js
scripts.build: npm run build-nodeps && cat fn/js/fn.js fn/js/stream.js polyfills/customevent.js polyfills/document.scrollingelement.js dist/dom-nodeps.js > dist/dom.js && minify dist/dom.js && cat css/dom.css > dist/dom.css
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/dom.js dist/dom-1.1.1.js && cp dist/dom.min.js dist/dom-1.1.1.min.js && cp dist/dom.css dist/dom-1.1.1.css
scripts.publish: git pull origin master && npm run build-version && git add dist/* && git commit -am 'Build version 1.1.1' && git push
